attributes.action: stop foreign organisations including the European Union being able to fund the BBC through loans or grants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The European Union gave a payment to the BBC which guarentees pro EU bias. The BBC news used to be the bench mark, now it is a little more than a EU propaganda department.  Either privatise it or make foreign donations illegal. It has £141 million in soft loans and a £1.4 million grant from the EU.
